reviews.text: Buena Vista Hotel was a perfect place to stay for our last night in Costa Rica. We had a room with a balcony and view of the volcano. The room was generous in size for the four of us and very clean. We booked this hotel because of the location near Volcano Poas, the falls,coffee plantation and the airport. Unfortunately, nature was uncooperative. The January 8 earthquake near Volcano Poas forced us to cut our stay here short. The Volcano Poas area was closed for a week so we changed our stay at the last minute. The staff was very understanding about our last minute changes and totally accommodating. We had a very early flight back to the USA so they left us out a little breakfast and wonderful Costa Rican coffee for our ride to the airport at 5 am. We will come back; but please......no more earthquakes!!
reviews.title: Beautiful views and hotel, staff was super helpful.

reviews.text: We selected this hotel to for a short stay in connection with the arrival to CR due to its location near the airport. It turn out to be much more; staff, room, restaurant , pool and garden were excellent and it is a good place to stay at as a base for exploring the country-side and the town San Jose.
reviews.title: Great hotel for everything

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: My husband and I stayed at this hotel a bit longer than our planned visit due to him contracting the stomach flu the second day we were in Costa Rica.
reviews.title: Wonderful staff and facilities!

reviews.text: The hotel's staff, Christian in particular, was extremely helpful, and we were referred to a local clinic in Alajuela. As the day went on we were still at the clinic, and Christian came to check up on us! Not only that, the hotel van took me back to the hotel to get some things so I could stay the night at the clinic with my husband, and loaned me a cell phone that I could use to make calls with for the night before dropping me back off at the clinic. They also came to pick us up the next day to take us back to the hotel once my husband was better.
reviews.title: Convenient and comfortable

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Their hospitality was warm and friendly even before this event, and we are eternally grateful to Christian and the other staff members that made our stay enjoyable, despite my husband's illness. They even gave us a discount since we didn't really "use" the room for a night.
reviews.title: Second Visit and Still a Great Hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The hotel is beautiful and very relaxing, and we'd definitely stay there again. Highly recommended!
reviews.title: We will always stay here when in CR

reviews.text: Although this hotel is not right next the airport, the shuttle met us at the airport. We were able to board an earlier flight into San Jose, so I called the hotel to let them know we will arrive two hours earlier than expected. We only had to wait about 20 minutes for the shuttle, but they made every effort to get there quickly. The staff was friendly and accommodating, the rooms were clean and sufficient, the restaurant was nice (order the sea bass!), and the coffee was wonderful! The back of the hotel overlooks the valley, and was a great place to drink (coffee or whatever), socialize with our friends and other guests at the hotel. When I travel through San Jose again, I will definitely stay here. I was initially worried being "stuck" here, being so far from the airport and from Dennys!, but this hotel exceeded my finicky expectations!
reviews.title: Bumbling family meets Exceptional Service

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: For Christian, Harlem, David, Marci, and Jose Carlos, your recommended driver,you made our first trip to Costa Rica a wonderful experience! You either provided or assisted us with help to navigate an unfamiliar country, helped introduce us to your country, and the warmth of its people. We asked, and you arranged a great driver that showed us the "real" Costa Rica. I felt like family with your staff, loved the accomodations,the work you have put into the grounds and nature walk and the incredible views of San Jose at night in the distance as well as the fabulous views during the day. We stayed at two other well known, highly advertised and much more expensive locations during our travel through the central valley of the country, and you remained our favorite. We missed you as we traveled, miss you now and WILL return to see you! Suzanne & David Canady, Tampa, Florida
reviews.title: Most helpful staff of any hotel we have ever stayed at...including the so called 5 stars

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed at this hotel our first night in Costa Rica and the last three nights of our trip. Recommended by many as a place to stay close to the airport (the hotel provided transportation to and from the airport!) and for touring in the area - Doka coffee plantation, Poas volcano and La Paz (when it opens again). The hotel is very comfortable,the food is very good, it has a beautiful view of San Jose and the staff could not be nicer. They patiently answered our questions and took care of our arrangements. We highly recommend!
reviews.title: Feels like home - wonderful people, service and location

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: My husband and I stayed at Hotel Buena Vista the last night of our CR trip. Since it is ideally located by the airport up the hilll, we choose it based on what others had said. The service was beyond wonderful; everyone was very nice and helpful. We even got a wake up door knock at 4:30am!
reviews.title: Great City Views

reviews.text: We got a room that overlooked the coffee fields and the views of the city. There is a quick 15minute walk through the coffee feilds which was pretty neat. There is a pool, but it looked very green and sort of scary. They had coffee available all the time, and complimentary breakfast. Since we had to leave so early, they had out muffins and bananas. They were so good and fresh!
reviews.title: Gorgeous View!!!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We'd come back to this place again and again.
reviews.title: Our second visit. Will be back

description: The comment ofter heard in this hotel is, "We feel like we are at home." This is exactly the impression the management and staff of the Buena Vista strive to create. We are high on the summit of a mountain with a climate of eternal spring yet only fifteen minutes drive from the International Airport below. We will pick you up there and show you the wonders of this exotic country.
